big.b: Please Read All the Instructions Before Attempting Exam

resources.string:
This app is made to enable the students to give exams from their own smartphone in a secure way.
 Permissions Required: The following permissions are required for the app to work:


1) Device Admin

2) Screen Pinning

 After allowing the above permissions, you will be taken to the exam hosted on your exam server.
 
You may be asked to login before you are able to take exam. The specific rule for exam and it's type will be decided by your examiner. This app is just a means to help your take the exam without any unfair means being used.

Please do not attempt to exit the Screen Pinning before submitting the exam as that will result in immediate cancellation of your exam.


How to Exit the app:

 After successfully submitting your exam, you can exit the exam by exiting the Screen Pinning. This can be done by the method specified by your phone. You can find this method by pressing the Home button.
